title: Soul On Ice
description: From the jacket: "In a collection of essays & open letters from California's Folsom State Prison, Eldridge Cleaver writes about the forces which shaped his life & which are currently molding our national destiny."IntroductionLetters from PrisonBlood of the BeastPrelude to Love-Three LettersWhite Woman, Black ManAbout the Author
author: Eldridge Cleaver
